org.myrobotlab.fileLib

Class FileIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.myrobotlab.fileLib.FileIO

  • public class FileIO
extends java.lang.Object
    class of useful utility functions we do not use nio - for portability reasons e.g. Android
    Author:
    GroG

      • listInternalContents

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> listInternalContents(java.lang.String path)
        similar to ls - when running in jar form will return contents of path in an array list of files when running in the ide will return the contents of /bin + path
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • loadPartFile

        public static byte[] loadPartFile(java.lang.String filename)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        inter process file communication - default is to wait and attempt to load a file in the next second - it comes from savePartFile - then the writing of the file from a different process should be an atomic move regardless of file size
        Parameters:
        filename -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
